sentences.en: A perennial plant, such as the English daisy , cultivated as a biennial.
sentences.cn: 所有一年生及二年生植物都是结果一次而后死去.

sentences.en: A total of 39 people received the biennial awards since 1996.
sentences.cn: 自1996年以来,共有39位中国科技工作者获此殊荣.

sentences.en: Configuration feature: Vivacious herb, normally biennial helps advance somebody's career.
sentences.cn: 形态特征: 多年生草本植物, 通常二年生栽培.

sentences.en: European biennial widely cultivated for its blue or violet or white flowers.
sentences.cn: 因其蓝色紫色或白色的花而被广泛种植的欧洲两年生草本植物.

sentences.en: Every union has its own annual or biennial meeting.
sentences.cn: 每个工会都有自己的年会或每二年一次的大会.

sentences.en: His is a biennial, and one of the most useful pasture plants we have.
sentences.cn: 这是两年生植物, 也是我们最有用的牧草之一.

sentences.en: If the biennial cycle is broken for one year the trees normally bear annual crops subsequently.
sentences.cn: 如果一年里打破了大小年的循环周期,植株以后就可正常结果.

sentences.en: It may subsequently become a weak grower and a distinctly biennial cropper.
sentences.cn: 随后会引起树势衰弱,明显两年结一次果.

sentences.en: North American annual or biennial with long soft hairs on the leaves.
sentences.cn: 北美一年生或两年生植物,叶子上有柔软的长毛.

sentences.en: Parsnips and carrots are biennial plants often grown as annuals.
sentences.cn: 防风草和胡萝卜是二年生植物,但却经常被作为一年生植物来种植.

sentences.en: Shanghai Art Biennial Show, Shanghai Museum of Fine Art.
sentences.cn: 96上海美术双年展(海·上海美术馆).

sentences.en: The 14 th Hong Kong Art Biennial 2003 is here again.
sentences.cn: 第14届香港艺术双年展又来了!

sentences.en: The award ceremony a biennial event attended by many dignitaries.
sentences.cn: 该颁奖典礼是个两年一度的盛会,有许多达官显贵会参加.

sentences.en: The workers were strongly against the biennial election.
sentences.cn: 工人们强烈反对两年一次的选举.

sentences.en: The yearly or the biennial visit is the rainbow on the horizon.
sentences.cn: 一年或两年一度的探亲如同天边的彩虹.

words.tran_cn: 每两年；两年一次地；（植物）两年生地

trans.tran_en: a biennial event happens once every two years
